TopicTitle: Building a rover carrying rocket is buggy

Articles.Content: During the building phase I encountered the issue where the part of the vessel that you are trying to detach/attach (in this case the rover) gets scrambled when you drag it around. I kind of attached the rocket with the rover but now it crashes 100% when trying to launch. It usually also crashes when the parts get scrambled and you try Undo/Redo. Which makes me wonder if the scrambling of parts during attachment and the crash are somewhat related. I have a save file that reliably reproduces this issue on at least 2 very different PCs.
